about_the_game:
The Whisper Ghost is a single-player you play a cleaner who is called to the same client every day. Every time he tells you a new and different story about what is happening at his house. The stories sound strange and mysterious, like they start out normal but take strange and disturbing turns.

With each passing day, you begin to notice strange patterns in the house, as if something is changing without explanation. The atmosphere in the ranking house, and the pressures of the wind become clearer, but they are always in the background, as if they are part of the structure of the house.

The progress in the game is through interaction with the house and with the stories that the customer tells. Each story reveals a little more about what's really going on..




Play Time
80 minutes


The Gameplay
This game is a first-person, exploration, cleaning and puzzling

WARNING!
This game, suitable for ages 16 and up, contains blood, alcohol, and frightening surprises.
